author: walters586
title: Very comfortable and very convenient
text:
After five days at another hotel in the city's newer section, I was well rested and ready to stay near the "old and picturesque" part of Paris. This hotel more than fits the bill. It is right next door to Les Halles, 150 meters from the Pompidou Center, 1/2 km from L'Hotel the Ville, within a km from Notre Dame, and onto the Latin Quarter from there. I walked a lot around the area which really came alive at night.
The room was very comfy and overlooked the square. Luckily, the windows are sound proof so I could sleep. I could smell complex yummy odors from other rooms on my floor; so I guess that the kitchen is as useful as it looks modern. The elevators work quite well and people at the lobby are multilingual and helpful. In addition to French, I heard English, Spanish, Portuguese being used.
I stayed five days, so I got a price break. But you can be sure that the next time I go to Paris, this hotel will be on my list of places to check out.
